greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of rooted trees with n nodes and colored non-root nodes using exactly k colors; triangle T(n,k), n>=1, 0<=k<=n-1, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened
maple: A:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n<2, n, (add(add(d*
T:= (n, k)-> add(A(n, k-i)*(-1)^i*binomial(k, i), i=0..k):
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n < 2, n, (Sum[Sum[d*A[d, k], {d, Divisors[j]}]* A[n - j, k]*k, {j, 1, n - 1}])/(n - 1)];
T[n_, k_] := Sum[A[n, k - i]*(-1)^i*Binomial[k, i], {i, 0, k}];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, 10}, {k, 0, n - 1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 07 2020, from Maple *)
xref: Columns k=0-1 give: A063524 (for n>0), A000081 (for n>1):
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 13 2015
